item.description:
We are looking for 15 Models who want to live in the glory days of Betty Page and Marilyn Monroe.

Models, message me or e-mail to chris@worcesterphotostudios.com for consideration. Models by invite only.

Designers are also welcome, and encouraged. Please RSVP so we know what to expect.

Pre-registration is required for Photographers. Cost: $60 for photographers, $40 for Studio Members. Payments through PayPal: payment@worcesterphotostudios.com. Reference Pin Up shoot. Or stop by to pay by cash/credit card.

Hair, Makeup artists and designers are free! Let us know if you are coming!

What to bring: Photographers can bring their own lights or use ours. There will be space for indoor and outdoor shooting. Props are encouraged. Designers and models should bring outfits and accessories they would like to show off.

Code of conduct:

Alcohol and drugs are strictly prohibited at all times.

If you are attending one of our events, please take a moment to review this.

This is an 18+ event. Inappropriate behavior will result in a verbal warning by a WPS staff member. If such behavior continues, you will be asked to leave.

These rules are put in place for everyone's safety and comfort. Any questions about Code Of Conduct or studio rules can be directed to info@worcesterphotostudios.com
item.name: Pin Up Shoot
